page.title: 03FARMING in the area.
page.content: Most of the area around {Milborne Port is used for farming.The majority of fields surveyed were given over to intensive grassland and a few cereal crops.At this time most of the fields are small with Hawthorn hedges as boundaries. The majority of farms have been passed on through the same families for many generations.It is most likely that this trend will continue. As this is a {dairy farming}area most farmers surveyed complained that they had suffered as a result of the E.E.C.Milk Quota system.The bank manager also commented that the future of dairy farming was in doubt for the same reason. We expect that as a result the face of the farming land around this area will change over the next decade.
